home.title: Civolution Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Civolution against V.I.C.I, the artificial opponent.
home.play2: This application replaces the solo card deck and guides you through the game and solo ruleset.

vici.about: If you want to play Civolution by yourself, let us introduce you to V.I.C.I, an I-CIV entity with the purpose of simulating a rival civilization.

setupBot.title: Setup V.I.C.I
setupBot.placeDisks: Choose a player color for V.I.C.I, take the 7 discs of that color and place one of them onto each of your discs on the game boards.
setupBot.takeTribesMarkers: Place 15 tribes (the remaining 5 are not used) and 50 markers of V.I.C.I’s color in V.I.C.I’s play area as a supply.
setupBot.placeStartingTribes: Place 1 of V.I.C.I’s tribes upright onto the remaining non-fire encampment in the Forest starting territory and 1 tribe upright onto the remaining non-fire encampment in the Grassland starting territory.
setupBot.placeProvisionMarker: Place a marker lengthwise in each of the two starting territories next to the farm building space. These markers do not represent raw materials but are called provision markers.
setupBot.takeDice: Place 6 activation dice and 1 fate die in V.I.C.I’s play area.
setupBot.diceNotice: You do not roll them, they are used to count the number of V.I.C.I's dice.
setupBot.noOtherComponents: Other components are not used for V.I.C.I.
